keyMoments.description: Miss All Sunday, the vice president of Baroque Works, makes her first appearance and reveals her position in the organization.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the second-highest ranking member of Baroque Works and shows the organization has even more powerful agents than previously known.

keyMoments.description: Baroque Works demonstrates its ruthlessness by destroying Igaram's ship in a massive explosion.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the lethal methods the organization employs to protect its secrets and eliminate threats.

reveals.content: Miss All Sunday revealed as the vice president and partner to Mr. 0 (Crocodile).
The organization uses deadly force including explosives to eliminate those who discover its secrets.

goals.goal: Take over the Kingdom of Arabasta
Eliminate Princess Vivi and anyone who knows Mr. 0's identity
